SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Model

Class CardMaps

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Model.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Model.CardMaps
public class CardMaps extends Observable
The singleton class `CardMaps` represents the collection of card maps for all players in the game. It manages the card maps and provides methods to retrieve, set, and manipulate card placements. This class extends `Observable`, allowing observers to be notified of changes to the card maps.

  • Field Summary

      public CardVisibilityRecord getCardByCoordinate(Coordinates coordinate, String owner)

      Parameters:

      owner - The owner of the card map.

    • setCardMaps

      public void setCardMaps(Map<String,CardMapRecord> cardMaps)

      Parameters:

      public Coordinates charsToCoordinates(char row, char column)

    • coordinateIndexByCharIndexes

      public int coordinateIndexByCharIndexes(char row, char column, String owner)
      Retrieves the index of a coordinate in the available placements for a given player's card map.
      Parameters:
      row - The character representing the row index.
      column - The character representing the column index.
      owner - The owner of the card map.
      Returns:
      The index of the coordinate in the available placements, or -1 if not found.
